Painful_Blast.help: You launch a blast of pure pain at a target, causing energy damage. The affected target also suffers from reduced recovery and chance to hit.
Painful_Blast.targetHelp: Your recovery and chance to hit have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Dread_Bolt.help: You fire a bolt of painful energy at a target, causing energy and smashing damage. This attack also has a chance to knock down the target.
Dread_Bolt.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Suffering.help: You unleash a burst of pain in a short radius around you. This deals energy damage to all targets in the burst and drains their endurance. It also has a chance to stun affected targets and reduce their chance to hit.
Suffering.shortHelp: AoE, Moderate DMG(Energy), -End(Foe), Chance for Stun(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
Suffering.targetHelp: Your endurance is being drained. There is a chance you are also stunned and suffering reduced chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Misery.help: You channel energy through your body and into a targeted foe. Through transference from the target, some of your health and that of your allies is restored. Additionally, your personal recovery and regeneration are boosted briefly. The targeted foe's regeneration, chance to hit and damage are reduced.
Misery.targetHelp: Your regeneration, damage potential and chance to hit have been reduced. You are also taking energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
The {PowerName} caused by {PlayerSource} also reduces your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate!

Dread_Torrent.help: You unleash a powerful cone of pain that deals energy and smashing damage to your target. This torrent also has a chance to knock affected targets back.
Dread_Torrent.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

World_of_Pain.help: You and your nearby allies gain a moderate damage, resistance, and to-hit bonus. Additionally, those affected by this power are protected against placation.
World_of_Pain.shortHelp: PBAoE, +ToHit(Self, Allies), +DMG(Self, Allies), +RES(Self, Allies, All, Placate)

Anguishing_Cry.help: You let out an anguishing cry which causes significant pain in your foes, reducing their resistance and defense to damage.
Anguishing_Cry.targetHelp: Your resistances and defense have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: You are affected by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} and suffer reduced resistances and defense.
